casebody.data:
ALTITUDE EXPRESS, INC., et al., Petitioners
v.
Melissa ZARDA, et al. No. 17-1623 Supreme Court of the United States. September 11, 2019

Joint motion of petitioner in No. 17-1618 and respondents in No. 17-1623 for divided argument denied. The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
